headline: Clean energy stocks drop as Trump's new executive order targets renewables
summary: A new executive order further lowers government support for renewable power. Stocks including First Solar and Enphase Energy dropped on Tuesday.

headline: Solar Stocks Slump on Trump Executive Order Cutting Federal Support

headline: SunRun, Enphase Stocks Tumble as Trump Adds to Gloom in Solar Sector
summary: The president directed the Treasury and Interior department to enforce the termination of wind and solar tax credits.

raw.headline: SunRun, Enphase Stocks Tumble as Trump Adds to Gloom in Solar Sector
raw.summary: The president directed the Treasury and Interior department to enforce the termination of wind and solar tax credits.

headline: New Trump Order Adds to Pressure on Sunrun and Other Renewable-Energy Stocks
summary: Renewable-energy stocks fell, after President Trump issued an executive order calling for tight application of the eligibility rules for clean-energy tax credits.  Shares in solar-equipment maker First Solar fell about 5% in morning trading Tuesday, while Sunrun dropped 11%.  The tax-and-spending bill passed by Republicans last week made good on Trump's promise to withdraw President Joe Biden’s green tax credits.

headline: 3 Top Dividend Stocks to Buy in July
summary: NextEra Energy is a giant U.S. utility with a 3.2% yield and rapidly growing dividend backed by 31 annual dividend increases.  Chevron is an integrated energy giant with an attractive 4.7% yield and 38 annual dividend hikes behind it.  Enterprise Products Partners is a giant midstream player with a 6.9% yield and 26 annual distribution hikes to brag about.
